EmailTemplate.name: LG Youth Board 2015-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Youth Board!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome Youth Boarders!
We are really excited to invite you to the first Youth Board session!
This will be a great session to meet your fellow youth boarders, learn about what is happening for the rest of the year and get involved in our first project!
When: Monday 23rd November 17:45 - 19:00
Where: Greenwich West Community Centre 141 Greenwich High Road, London, SE10 8JA (Nearest station Greenwich).
Please expect fun, friends and pizza.
See you there!
Lisa, Jane and Janine :)
